title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-2.4 - Basis of medical appeals unit's decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-2.4 - Basis of medical appeals unit's decision

State Regulations

Upon the record of the county medical society, or the
workers' compensation committee of a county medical society, and on such briefs
as the appellant may submit, the Medical Appeals Unit may affirm, reverse or
modify the report, findings and recommendation of the county medical society, or of the workers' compensation committee of a county medical society, appealed
or reviewed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
326-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
